pages.text: The $(mob)Elder Guardian$() is a miniboss. 3 are found in each $(thing)Ocean Monument$().$(p)It is a much bigger $(l:minecraft_guardian)$(mob)Guardian$(), sharing the same set of attacks and behavior, but moves around less. It also inflicts long $(thing)Mining Fatigue$() on nearby players, preventing them from breaking through its chamber.

$(mob)Elder Guardians$() drop the same items as $(l:minecraft_guardian)$(mob)Guardians$() on death, but also drop $(item)Sponge$(). It can be placed next to $(thing)Water$() to absorb several blocks at once.$(p)After doing so the $(item)Sponge$() becomes wet and needs to be dried in a $(item)Furnace$() to be used again.
